description.p: Returns the arc cosine of an angle expressed in radians.
A numeric field or value between -1 and 1.
Returns the arc cosine of the angle.

discussion.p: The Acos function returns the arc cosine of an angle specified as Radians.

example.caption: Acos() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 acos(0.3) AS EXPR1 FROM Products = 1.2661036727795
